title: Big Thicket National Preserve: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger              Be A Junior Ranger         Junior Ranger logo NPS Image  Junior Ranger Program  This is a fun way for our young visitors to learn about natural world of Big Thicket National Preserve. Just ask the ranger at the Visitor Center for a free Junior Ranger Guidebook, then complete the activities to earn a certificate and a Junior Ranger badge.
